ygData.subject: Thanks for the SOW!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Foleen, your wife was kind enough to SOW me as I was on my way to recover my corpse in LGuk :-) Thank her for me! I finally obtained the last of the rods for
ygData.messageBody:
Foleen, your wife was kind enough to SOW me as I
was on my way to recover my corpse in LGuk :-) Thank
her for me! I finally obtained the last of the rods
for the Staff of the Wheel quest (thanks to
Smoothie!)and completed the quest. I was disappointed it was a
no exp quest but the staff was prize enough. I still
need to go to Guk but I don't have to do to deadside.
Need to kill the Monk for the glowing mask (to obtain
my acumen mask) and need to kill Shinta the froglok
warrior for a barbarians head that is part of Tishans
Kilt quest. And of course the priest in unrest has not
been very cooperative in spawning so I can do the
mystic cloak quest. All in all tis going good, am 35 now
so my lvling will slow down since am in hell again.
I am enjoying EQ again this second time around, I
hope it stays that way!<br><br>Jonquil
